name: Kimagure My Baby: Musume no Sugoroku Seichouki
overview: Kimagure My Baby - Musume no Sugoroku Seichouki is a sort of a mix between The Game of Life and Namco's Kosodate Quiz My Angel (but is not related to any of them). In the game the player can choose between one of 4 different baby girls (Maki, Miki, Nozomi & Kurumi) that will be his daughter in a cute board game and playing the board game he will see her going from a little baby to a woman, depending of the role of the dice the events will be one or others (school, happy days, sad days, vacations, marriage, etc.). Since this is a board game the game features 3 different boards (small, medium & large) & up to 4 human players to play at the same (as the fathers of the 4 girls) time. The game features 4 unlockables pictures galleries of the 4 girls that can be unlocked playing the main board game.
